Posts.Content: hi im new to this but was just wondering if anyone else has had the same .....11 weeks ago i had a really sharp pain in my right breast like a hot poker 2 days later the whole breast was painful then a day or 2 later it was twice the size of the other so i went to the docs she couldnt feel any lumps and put me on antibiotics which didnt work then i had pain in my arm pit and my arm felt tight so i went back and was referred to a breast clinic i didnt see the specialist i was meant to i saw his under study i am over weight and that was all she was interested in and put everything down to my weight iv never sufferd with painful breasts even when i had my 4 children i was told i couldnt have a mammogram because im only 33 and i couldnt have an ultrasound because there is no lump i was in and out within 10 mins so i wasnt very happy that was a month ago anyway i went back to see another doctor because the pain is now in my shoulder an collor bone and i have what look like ridges and little pin holes over my breast the pain and swelling has been there every day for 11 weeks i have been referred to another hosptital and another breast clinic tomoz im really unsure whats going on and its really getting me down iv tried parecetamol ibuprofen co-codamolÂ  and others for the pain and nothing works any info on what this could be would be really appreciated thank you sammie
Posts.Title: unsure
